thread.title_full: IGTM provides perfect platform to network with European Tour PropertiesTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: IGTM provides perfect platform to network with European Tour PropertiesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
IGTM provides perfect platform to network with European Tour Properties Published on : Wednesday, September 23, 2015
European Tour Properties, a network of 16 world class golf venues, is returning to the International Golf Travel Market (IGTM) for the eighth consecutive year.
Presenting and promoting its internationally-recognised portfolio of member venues, all of which have a close association with The European Tour, European Tour Properties will participate in the premier global event for golf tourism suppliers, buyers and media, at the Magma Arte & Congresos, Tenerife, from October 5-8 .
During the show, European Tour Properties will also announce its latest member venue, an award-winning destination with strong links to The European Tour.
Delegates visiting the event and stand G020 will be able to meet with representatives from:
PGA Catalunya Resort, voted IAGTO Resort of the Year 2015 Diamond Country Club, home to the Lyoness Open, a European Tour event since 2010 Estonian Golf and Country Club, featuring the European Top 100 Sea Course Jumeirah Golf Estates, home to the DP World Tour Championship, the season-ending finale of The European Tourâ€™s Race to Dubai Le Golf National, Paris, venue of The 2018 Ryder Cup Terre Blanche Hotel Spa Golf Resort
